fullText:
News4 has team coverage on the crash victims’ families, first responders’ memories and transportation officials’ warnings.

Lauren Scala finds out how you can win a trip to Palm Coast, Florida. No Pur. Nec. Void where prohibited. 21+ Ends 2/1. Subject to Official Rules.

Bruce Springsteen released a fiery protest song Wednesday dedicated to the memory of Renee Good and Alex Pretti, two Minneapolis residents who were fatally shot by federal agents this month.

Lauren Scala learns how to fight and do stunts like a movie star at New York’s Action Hero Academy.

The special explores how Bad Bunny has become an unstoppable force. When and where to watch.

Fans have shared screenshots of queues with hundreds of thousands of people all trying to nab tickets to the singer’s “Together Together” tour.

The film, which celebrates all the pageantry that comes with the historic horse race, was filmed at the Kentucky Derby’s beloved Churchill Downs Racetrack.

Emmy nominee Camila Morrone tells Sara Gore about the second season of “The Night Manager,” and an upcoming horror series from The Duffer Brothers.

Peyton List sits down with Sara Gore to dish on the third season of “School Spirits” and joining the Off-Broadway hit “Heathers: The Musical.”

Gerran Howell chats with Sara Gore about season 2 of “The Pitt,” what’s next for Whitaker, and medical bootcamps.

Swims is one of many acts who will perform before the 2026 Super Bowl matchup between the New England Patriots and Seattle Seahawks.

Social media users have a range of reasons for why you should avoid wearing red at a wedding.

The “Euphoria” and “Housemaid” star used the Los Angeles landmark to launch her new lingerie line.

What to know about the new “America’s Next Top Model” documentary coming to Netflix.

Neil Young is offering free access to his entire music catalog to residents of Greenland.

Kay Angrum heads to Cobble Hill to find out why Bolo Bolo Cafe & Bakery is drawing crowds for its Asian-inspired treats and teas.

Tony nominee Melissa Errico chats with Sara Gore about her new album of standards and annual Birdland residency.

“NBC News Daily” anchor Kate Snow sits down with Sara Gore to chat about her digital series “The Drink,” new podcast, & musical talent.

Paul Costabile sits down with Jason Segel to preview season 3 of the Emmy-nominated dramedy “Shrinking.”

textIssues: Show title not found in text
dtliExcerpt: Don't be fooled by the title of Disney's latest film-to-stage transfer. Aladdin may be named after its lead street urchin character, but the musical comedy that just opened at the New Amsterdam Theatre is all about one character: the Genie. That's due to the casting of the energetic James Monroe Iglehart, who all but erases the memory of Robin Williams, the voice of the Genie in the 1992 animated film. It's rare that you see an actor playing a character he was born to play in a career-defining performance. Iglehart, last seen on Broadway in Memphis, uses his background in improv to create a comedic and charismatic Genie, who's equal parts Fats Waller, Luther Vandross and Oprah Winfrey ("You get a wish! You get a wish!").

garbageTextRemoved.reason: NBC New York homepage content (Al Roker, news headlines) - not a review
